job_title: Adult Education Administrative in Columbus, NE
pros: Very professional and friendly work environment. Great communication and always offers great trainings.
cons: It is very rare to get a full time position.

pros: Paid time off between Christmas and New Year's

pros: Truly make an impact on the school and community

review_title: If you have to live here this is probably  the best choice for compensation

review_title: Best place in our area to work
job_title: Administrative Assistant in Grand Island, NE
pros: Better pay than others in the area, better benefits, supportive environment, opportunity to contribute positively
cons: Difficult to move out of Administrative Assistant position - everyone wants to work here, so there are many highly-qualified applicants for all open positions.  Maybe less value is placed on people who already work here.
